name: PEW (damon)
description:
ONLY SERIOUS DEMON-HUNTERS NEED APPLY.

DESTROY ALL THE DEMONLINGS AND TRAVEL DEEPER INTO THE PITS OF HELL.

FOR THE BEST DEMON-HUNTING EXPERIENCE, USE MICROSOFT WINDOWS.

USE WASD TO MOVE.
LEFT-CLICK TO SHOOT A COOL GUN.
'ESCAPE' IS THE ONLY THING THAT CAN PAUSE YOUR DEMON-SLAYING.
